course_description: The course provides an overview of the modern Iranian society through its cinema in the last 40 years of post-revolutionary Iran.  It covers topics like Social Diversity; Revolution & War; Women & Gender Issues; Family & Relationship; Class Conflict; Morality; Education; Immigration; Forbidden Life.
schedule_location: MW 1pm-2:15pm in New Psyc Bldg 250 (36 Eagle Ro
